lead_paragraph: David Beckham scored his first goal for Los Angeles on a free kick in the 27th minute of the Galaxy’s SuperLiga semifinal game against D.C. United in Carson, Calif. Beckham, nursing an ankle injury, played 63 minutes before heading to the bench.
